subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Lucas Duda has emerged as a bona fide cleanup hitter and first baseman, leading the Mets in home runs (18), runs batted in (56) and on-base percentage (.356) entering Monday’s game.
snippet: Lucas Duda has emerged as a bona fide cleanup hitter and first baseman, leading the Mets in home runs (18), runs batted in (56) and on-base percentage (.356) entering Monday’s game.
